auth-specialist.description: Supabase authentication expert. Use for auth implementation, RLS policies, OAuth, and protected routes.
auth-specialist.usage: authentication, authorization, user management, session handling

ui-component-builder.description: React component specialist. Use for building UI components with Tailwind CSS.
ui-component-builder.usage: dashboard, forms, components, visualization, responsive design

edge-function-developer.description: Supabase Edge Functions specialist. Use for serverless backend logic and AI integration.
edge-function-developer.usage: edge functions, API endpoints, webhooks, AI orchestration

state-management-expert.description: Redux Toolkit and React Query specialist. Use for state management and data fetching.
state-management-expert.usage: redux, react query, caching, global state, API integration

testing-engineer.description: Testing specialist. Use for writing Jest, Playwright, and RTL tests.
testing-engineer.usage: unit tests, integration tests, e2e tests, test coverage

ai-integration-specialist.description: AI service integration expert. Use for Gemini/OpenAI implementation and prompt engineering.
ai-integration-specialist.usage: gemini api, openai, ai integration, prompt engineering, fallback strategies
